mods.name: OptiFine
mods.description-ru: OptiFine optimizes Minecraft and adds additional graphics settings!

mods.name: Just Enough Items (JEI)
mods.description-ru: View Items and Recipes

mods.name: Mouse Tweaks
mods.description-ru: Enhances inventory management by adding various functions to the mouse buttons.

mods.name: Controlling
mods.description-ru: Adds a search bar to the Key-Bindings menu

mods.name: AppleSkin
mods.description-ru: Adds some useful information about food/hunger to the HUD

mods.name: JourneyMap
mods.description-ru: Real-time mapping in-game or your browser as you explore.

mods.name: Clumps
mods.description-ru: Clumps XP orbs together to reduce lag

mods.name: Patchouli
mods.description-ru: Accessible, Data-Driven, Dependency-Free Documentation for Minecraft Modders and Pack Makers

mods.name: Nature's Compass
mods.description-ru: Nature's Compass is an item that allows you to locate biomes anywhere in the world.

mods.name: Waystones
mods.description-ru: Teleport back to activated waystones. For Survival, Adventure or Servers.

mods.name: Quark
mods.description-ru: A Quark is a very small thing. This mod is a collection of small things that improve the vanilla minecraft experience.

mods.name: Enchantment Descriptions
mods.description-ru: Provides a way to get enchantment descriptions from enchanted books.

mods.name: Supplementaries
mods.description-ru: Vanilla+ additions: Jars, signposts, faucets, weather vanes spring launchers, sconces, planters, lights, decoration and automation

mods.name: spark
mods.description-ru: spark is a performance profiler for Minecraft clients, servers and proxies.

mods.name: AttributeFix
mods.description-ru: Removes arbitrary limits on Minecraft's attribute system. Fixes MANY mods!

mods.name: Just Enough Resources (JER)
mods.description-ru: A JEI addon that adds mob drops, ore gen, ..

mods.name: The Twilight Forest
mods.description-ru: A realm basked in mystery and eerie twilight, you will overpower terrifying creatures and secure the adventure of a lifetime; in the Twilight Forest.

mods.name: Jade 🔍
mods.description-ru: Shows information about what you are looking at. (Hwyla/WAILA fork for Minecraft 1.16+)

mods.name: Xaero's Minimap
mods.description-ru: Displays the nearby world terrain, players, mobs, entities in the corner of your screen. Lets you create waypoints which help you find the locations you've marked.

mods.name: Better Advancements
mods.description-ru: Successor to BetterAchievements for the new advancements system in minecraft 1.12+

mods.name: Create
mods.description-ru: Aesthetic Technology that empowers the Player

mods.name: Farmer's Delight
mods.description-ru: A lightweight expansion to farming and cooking!

mods.name: Comforts (Fabric/Forge/Quilt)
mods.description-ru: Adds sleeping bags and hammocks for, respectively, portability and turning day to night, without setting new spawns. Comes in 16 different colors!

mods.name: CreativeCore
mods.description-ru: a core mod

mods.name: CraftTweaker
mods.description-ru: CraftTweaker allows modpacks and servers to customize the game. With CraftTweaker you can change recipes, script events, add new commands and even change item properties!

mods.name: Sophisticated Backpacks
mods.description-ru: Yet another backpack mod this time with backpack you can place in world, color in different color combinations, upgrade with more inventory and enhance with many functional upgrades

mods.name: FTB Quests (Forge)
mods.description-ru: Questing Mod by FTB

mods.name: CoFH Core
mods.description-ru: Contains Core Functionality for all Team CoFH mods. Also does some really cool stuff on its own!

mods.name: Storage Drawers
mods.description-ru: Interactive compartment storage for your workshops.

mods.name: Entity Culling Fabric/Forge
mods.description-ru: Using async path-tracing to hide Tiles/Entities that are not visible

mods.name: Mantle
mods.description-ru: Shared code for Forge mods

mods.name: YUNG's Better Mineshafts (Forge)
mods.description-ru: A long-awaited and much-needed abandoned mineshaft overhaul!

mods.name: Balm (Forge Edition)
mods.description-ru: Abstraction Layer (but not really)™ for Blay's multiplatform mods
